application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1-Yew(Taxus baccata) -reduce crown height by 1m to suitable growth points maintaining natural canopy line -prune lateral branch length by 0.75 to match endpsuring good separation from telecom cables and house frontage Rear garden T2-Magnolia(M.soulangea) -light reduction by 25%(0.75m max.) to suitable growth points T3-Plum(Prunus) -reduce crown by 25%(1.3m) to suitable growth points -prune side branch growth to match(0.6m), shape, balance and tidy T4-Ash(Fraxinus excelsior) -reduce entire crown by 30%(2m) to suitable growth points -reduce lateral branch length to match(1.5m) ensuring good separation from house extension wall All works for routine maintanence
